akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 115–282, title VI, § 601(c)(5), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4290

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2073. Repealed. Pub. L. 115–282, title VI, § 601(c)(5), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4290
Section, Pub. L. 96–591, § 5, Dec. 24, 1980, 94 Stat. 3434; Pub. L. 97–322, title I, § 118(c), Oct. 15, 1982, 96 Stat. 1586; Pub. L. 98–557, § 16(b)(2), Oct. 30, 1984, 98 Stat. 2866; Pub. L. 101–225, title I, § 105(a)(1), Dec. 12, 1989, 103 Stat. 1909; Pub. L. 104–324, title III, § 304(a), (g), Oct. 19, 1996, 110 Stat. 3917, 3918; Pub. L. 107–295, title III, § 334, Nov. 25, 2002, 116 Stat. 2105; Pub. L. 108–293, title IV, § 418(e), Aug. 9, 2004, 118 Stat. 1049; Pub. L. 111–281, title VI, § 621(f), Oct. 15, 2010, 124 Stat. 2977, related to the establishment of the Navigation Safety Advisory Council. See section 15107 of Title 46, Shipping.
